title: H.A.M. Hideout

properties.value: The H.A.M. Hideout is the base of operations for the Humans Against Monsters organisation. It is located west of the Lumbridge general store. To enter it, the player will need to pick the lock on the trapdoor to get in. This can be done with the player's hand, but a lockpick will increase the players chance of success. The fastest way there is using an Amulet of Glory to teleport to Draynor Village and running east.

H.A.M. Hideout
Released22 February 2005 (Update)
MembersYes
Floors2
LocationMisthalin
InhabitantsH.A.M. members
MusicMonster Melee
Map

The H.A.M. Hideout is the base of operations for the Humans Against Monsters organisation. It is located west of the Lumbridge general store. To enter it, the player will need to pick the lock on the trapdoor to get in. This can be done with the player's hand, but a lockpick will increase the players chance of success. The fastest way there is using an Amulet of Glory to teleport to Draynor Village and running east.

Contents

  • 1 Notable features
  • 2 Store rooms
  • 3 Quests
  • 4 Personalities
  • 5 Monsters
  • 6 Music

Notable features[edit | edit source]

  • With 15 Thieving, a player may pickpocket the female H.A.M. members for H.A.M. clothing and other items (including easy clue scrolls).
  • At 20 Thieving, the same can be done with male H.A.M. members, for the same items, although better rates at higher items.
  • On the third time a player is caught thieving H.A.M. members that said player will be kicked out of the dungeon or be locked up in the cell with Jimmy the Chisel, which will require you to lockpick the door to exit. Home Teleport can be used to escape, and other teleports will also work as normal.
  • If a player is wearing a full set of H.A.M. robes, (shirt, robe, hood, cloak, logo, boots and gloves.) the player is less likely to be kicked out when pickpocketing.

Store rooms[edit | edit source]

Secret entrance to the H.A.M. Store room
Main article: H.A.M. Store room

Players who have progressed at least halfway through Death to the Dorgeshuun can access the secret dungeon inside the hideout. The secret entrance is located just south of the podium.

Quests[edit | edit source]

All the following quests are involved with the HAM dungeon:

  • The Lost Tribe
  • Death to the Dorgeshuun
  • One Small Favour

Personalities[edit | edit source]

  • Sigmund
  • H.A.M. Deacon
  • Johanhus Ulsbrecht
  • Jimmy the Chisel

Monsters[edit | edit source]

  • H.A.M. guard

[[File:H.A.M. Hideout location.png|thumb|250px]]
The '''H.A.M. Hideout''' is the base of operations for the [[Humans Against Monsters]] organisation. It is located west of the [[Lumbridge]] [[general store]]. To enter it, the player will need to pick the lock on the trapdoor to get in. This can be done with the player's hand, but a [[lockpick]] will increase the players chance of success. The fastest way there is using an [[Amulet of glory|Amulet of Glory]] to teleport to [[Draynor Village]] and running east.

==Notable features==
*With 15 [[Thieving]], a player may [[pickpocket]] the female [[H.A.M. members]] for [[H.A.M. clothing]] and other items (including [[Clue scroll (easy)|easy clue scrolls]]).
*At 20 Thieving, the same can be done with male H.A.M. members, for the same items, although better rates at higher items.
*On the third time a player is caught thieving H.A.M. members that said player will be kicked out of the dungeon or be locked up in the cell with Jimmy the Chisel, which will require you to lockpick the door to exit. Home Teleport can be used to escape, and other teleports will also work as normal.
*If a player is wearing a full set of H.A.M. robes, ([[H.A.M. shirt|shirt]], [[H.A.M. robe|robe]], [[H.A.M. hood|hood]], [[H.A.M. cloak|cloak]], [[H.A.M. logo|logo]], [[H.A.M. boots|boots]] and [[H.a.m. gloves|gloves]].) the player is less likely to be kicked out when pickpocketing.

==Store rooms==
[[File:H.A.M. Store room entrance.png|200px|right|thumb|Secret entrance to the H.A.M. Store room]]
{{Main|H.A.M. Store room}}
Players who have progressed at least halfway through [[Death to the Dorgeshuun]] can access the secret dungeon inside the hideout. The secret entrance is located just south of the podium.

==Quests==
All the following quests are involved with the HAM dungeon:
*[[The Lost Tribe]]
*[[Death to the Dorgeshuun]]
*[[One Small Favour]]
